

Polaris
=======
.. .. image:: _static/logo.png
..    :alt: Polaris Logo
..    :width: 221px
..    :height: 50px

**Polaris** is a universal and efficient command line tool tailored for rapid and accurate chromatin loop detectionfrom from contact maps generated by various assays, including bulk Hi-C, scHi-C, Micro-C, and DNA SPRITE.

Polaris is particularly well-suited for analyzing sparse scHi-C data and low-coverage datasets.

Follow Polaris development on `GitHub <https://github.com/ai4nucleome/Polaris>`_.
